project_abstract.cdata: The project consists of: improvement and subsequent maintenance of about 1,000 km of feeder roads and maintenance of about 250 km of existing feeder roads; purchase of highway equipment and spare parts and of materials and supplies for project operations; technical assistance for project implementation and monitoring; construction of a headquarters building for BPP.
